description: Schema for describing applied promotions (dev.ocs.order.applied_promotions@1.0). Returned on the final Order object.

id.description: A unique ID for this specific application of the promotion.

source.description: The code or identifier used to trigger the promotion (e.g., 'SUMMER10').

description.description: A human-readable description of the discount (e.g., '10% Off Summer Sale').

value.description: The value of the effect. Could be a Money object, an array of added CartItems, or a string like 'free_shipping'.
